description: This file contains CSS styles for a React frontend application, including theme management with light and dark mode colors, styling for various components like headers and buttons, and animation for the application logo.

classes.name: .App
classes.description: The main application container with center alignment, background color management, and transition effects.

classes.name: .App-header
classes.description: The header of the application, styled with a background color and flexbox layout for centering children.

classes.name: .App-link
classes.description: Styled link with transition effects for color changes.

classes.name: .theme-toggle
classes.description: Button for toggling the theme, styled with background color, border, and hover effects.
